text: hi
how are you today?
so you gonna donate or what
sure I can donate but what is the game?
you gotta donate your payment
If I donate, what do I get in return?  Will you donate the same amount back to me?
No, I don\'t believe that\'s the case. However, it\'s for a good cause. "Save the children." dont you like children? they need your help. its just 2 bucks. or ill tell you what, how about just half?
I'll give .50 if you send are actually an mturk human.  respond with your mturk number and I'll donate .50
why should i give you my mturk number? also, i think you should be a little bit more generous, come on bro, 1 dollar wont kill you.
ok, I'll do $1 but I want to know your mturk worker ID to prove it's a person

no you could use my info to do some sketchy crap. Don't i sound human, what kind of AI talks like this. Also, im skeptical to see if youre actually human. tell me a joke to prove it. robots cant laugh, a im sure you know
That's true.  I do believe you are human based on the conversation.  I'll donate a $1.
sounds good thanks
Hopefully it is for a good cause and not just a waste.
its for a good cause, im not a complete asshat
that's good.  you do have to be skeptical though
I hear ya. When is this over?
I was wondering the same thing.  I think it's 10 exchanges
how many has it been?
I haven't counted but we must be very close.  Hopefully we can move on soon to get back to other tasks.
